trans-unit.source: The ReplicationConnectionCollection class is a read-only collection of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: ReplicationConnectionCollection 類別是唯讀的集合<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref> object is in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref>物件是否在這個集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref> object to search for in this collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"> </xref>在這個集合中搜尋的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref> object is in this collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref>物件是否在這個集合中; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The connection parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The connection parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Copies all <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref> objects in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 複製所有<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref>到指定的陣列，從目標陣列的指定索引處開始，此集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref> objects that receives the elements of this collection.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref>物件會接收此集合的項目。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `connections` where this method starts copying this collection.
trans-unit.target: 中以零為起始的索引`connections`這個方法開始複製這個集合的位置。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The destination array is not large enough, based on the source collection size and the index specified.
trans-unit.target: 目的陣列並不夠大，根據來源集合的大小和 index 指定。

trans-unit.source: The connections parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The connections parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The index specified is out of range of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: index 指定超出目的陣列範圍。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref> object in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的第一個出現的索引<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref>此集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref> object to search for in this collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"> </xref>在這個集合中搜尋的物件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first matching object.
trans-unit.target: 第一個相符物件的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns -1 if no member of the collection is identical to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 會傳回-1，如果集合中的沒有成員與相同<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The connection parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The connection parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The specified connection does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定 connection 不存在。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref> object in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref>此集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref> object to get.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref>取得的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"></xref> object that exists at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnection"> </xref>存在指定的索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: The index specified is out of range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: index 指定超出範圍的集合。
